optionLines: Exactly!  I also spent a lot of time on the quiz.
Yeah! The TA even said the grade would be curved.
Well... I don't know... Probably we are just gifted for that?
Um... Not really. I just studied for these questions yesterday.
Maybe... But... Do you guys really believe something like that?
OK... Never mind. Let's just do Frank's idea. We don't have too much time left now.
All right, maybe it's my bad for not making it clear. Let me try saying it another way...
I think you didn't get my point actually. It's very different from Frank's idea. It's like...
